(16 marks)

State and explain Adam Smith’s four Canons of Taxation.  

(i) Canon of Equality means should be justiciable in the form  
of Equality where paying taxes.  

(ii) Canon of Certainty means the tax payer should be well  
aware of the purpose, amount and manner of payment.  

(iii) Canon of Convenience means that payment should be easy,  
convenient and taxpayer-friendly.  

(iv) Canon of Economy means that taxes collect should be as  
minimum as possible.
